attributes.action: Hold a UK-Wide referendum on whether Scotland should remain part of the UK
attributes.additional_details: There is clearly much discussion and debate around whether Scotland should remain part of the UK.  There has already been one referendum on this issue - voted on by the Scots.  However, the ramifications of whether Scotland leaves or remains has a profound effect on ALL those in the UK.  It therefore would be fair to seek the opinion of all of the UK in a second Referendum.
attributes.background: There are calls for a Scottish Referendum on whether Scotland should remain part of the UK.
